name: Mahjong Summer Deluxe - Majong Amazing Journey (Pro Version)
name_original: Mahjong Summer Deluxe - Majong Amazing Journey (Pro Version)
description:
Embark on a magical journey in this addictive Mahjong Summer Deluxe!

Mastering Mahjong will require skill, some strategy, lot of calculation, as well as a piece of luck.

Enjoy bonus levels, points, and more!!

Features!
- Enjoy Super Graphics
- Over +100 Boards
- New Daily Boards
- hint, undo and shuffle board options
- shadow option
- clear big tiles
- autosave when exit or take a call
- no interference with music player

Mahjong Summer Deluxe is always there for you no matter where you are, whether at home, on the road, in a plane, or on a subway.
